QuestData.Title: Midnight in the Garden of the Loa
QuestData.Description:
Yazma and her henchtroll Vol'kaal have pulled most of their forces back to de Garden of de Loa.
Something bad is afoot, I can feel it in my spirit. Pa'ku is in danger, along with all de loa who have followers dere.
Come, let's fly dere and put an end to dese heresies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Hexlord Raal to the Garden of the Loa.
